metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000189 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
nodejs ejs version older than 2.5.5 is vulnerable to a denial-of-servicedue to weak input validation in the ejs.renderFile()

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000189` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-ejs - 2.5.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-ejs package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.7-1').
